name: Swamped (PerfectPenguini)
description: A small survival horror game set in a jungle. This game was made over the course of 5 days in unreal engine, and the entire process was documented on my youtube at PerfectPenguini. I wouldn't recommend playing it unless you have quite a beefy computer, or at all really. It can be pretty fun to just walk around in for a bit, but it doesn't even have much of an objective.
